select c.cate_name cateName, v.id,v.title video_title,v.cover_path cover,v.video_path path, v.upload_time uploadTime,v.brief description, u.pic_img userPhoto from yx_category c right join video v on c.id=v.category_id left join yx_user u on v.user_id=u.id where v.title like concat('%',#{content},'%') order by v.upload_time desc
